6
7// Thread.h : Defines the Thread class which represents a global EGL thread.
8
9#ifndef LIBANGLE_THREAD_H_
10#define LIBANGLE_THREAD_H_
11
12#include <EGL/egl.h>
13
14#include "libANGLE/Debug.h"
15
16namespace angle
17{
18extern bool gUseAndroidOpenGLTlsSlot;
19} // namespace angle
20
21namespace gl
22{
23class Context;
24} // namespace gl
25
26namespace egl
27{
28class Error;
29class Debug;
30class Display;
31class Surface;
32
33class Thread : public LabeledObject
34{
35 public:
36 Thread();
37
38 void setLabel(EGLLabelKHR label) override;
39 EGLLabelKHR getLabel() const override;
40
41 void setSuccess();
42 void setError(const Error &error,
43 const Debug *debug,
44 const char *command,
45 const LabeledObject *object);
46 EGLint getError() const;
47
48 void setAPI(EGLenum api);
49 EGLenum getAPI() const;
50
51 void setCurrent(gl::Context *context);
52 Surface *getCurrentDrawSurface() const;
53 Surface *getCurrentReadSurface() const;
54 gl::Context *getContext() const;
55 Display *getDisplay() const;
56
57 private:
58 EGLLabelKHR mLabel;
59 EGLint mError;
60 EGLenum mAPI;
61 gl::Context *mContext;
62};
63
64} // namespace egl
65
66#endif // LIBANGLE_THREAD_H_
67
